```{r init}
rm(list=ls())
set.seed(20170101)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library('flexsurv')
source("../lifespan.r")
```

# Load boostrapped fitting results

```{r load}
report = read.csv("sandbox/Bootstrap_summary.csv")
report = report[, c("strains", "R", "n", "t0","GompRFlex", "GompGFlex")]
summary(report)
```

# Appromixation conditions

Calculate lambda based on t0 = (1-p)/(p Lambda) So, 1/lambda = t0 * p / (1-p)


```{r p=0.9 }
p = 0.9
report$One.over.lambdaP09 = report$t0 * p/ (1-p)
report[, c("strains", "t0", "One.over.lambdaP09")]
mean(report$One.over.lambdaP09)
```

```{r p=0.7 }
p = 0.7
report$One.over.lambdaP07 = report$t0 * p/ (1-p)
report[, c("strains", "t0", "One.over.lambdaP07")]
mean(report$One.over.lambdaP07)
```
